<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="51694" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="51694" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.90</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="11179">11,179</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1509"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Burberry Her</b> by <b>Burberry</b> is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. <b>Burberry Her</b> was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes are Strawberry, Raspberry, Blackberry, Sour Cherry, Black Currant, Mandarin Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Violet and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Cashmeran, Woody Notes, Amber, Oakmoss and Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Burberry Her, a new pillar fragrance for the house, comes out in October 2018 and is the first one whose packaging is marked with the new logo.</p>

<p>Burberry Her is designed to capture the youthful spirit of the city of London, the creative and eclectic metropolis; a spirit that is lively, adventurous and brave. It is made for those women who feel Londoners at heart. The composition is signed by Francis Kurkdjian as his interpretation of a floral-fruity theme with gourmand undertones. Crushed berry fruit from the top is combined with middle notes of violet and jasmine, based on woods and amber.</p>

<p>"Her Eau de Parfum by Burberry is unique because it is a memorable signature. To achieve that, you need a strong accord, an olfactory story that translates your vision. The combination of these sunburst berries and British spirit blended with the ambery musky accord brings this very unique signature. You can immediately recognize when someone is wearing it. It is a signature scent." - Francis Kurkdjian</p>

<p>The face of perfume is model Cara Delavigne, representing her home city. Burberry Her is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.</p>

<p><br />

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2354344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354344" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1711450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711450">Perfumki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732042574" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fact that this is considered a strawberry forward scent is wild to me. I just don't get that from it at all. Upon first smelling this, I just wasn't wowed by it. I also detected the very familiar Baccarat/Cloud DNA which comes off very chemical and bitter to my nose. It feels redundant and it smells nothing like a milkshake to me in the slightest.<br />
<br />
It isn't lactonic or creamy, but rather quite musky and powdery. It also comes off as sort of "clinical" to me (or like a sterile hospital room). It's almost metallic and just sort of strange. The notes just don't blend well to me and it definitely isn't a gourmand. The drydown is particularly dull and that weird chemical scent just lingers on. <br />
<br />
I know there's some discussion about which version is best, but The Elixir doesn't smell like a pleasant milkshake to me, either. Hard pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2354344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2354344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MyMini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MyMini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306633">MyMini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this scent so much! It is mainly strawberry like Coach Love but it has other notes. It also reminds me of Toy Bubble Gum. It smells sweet and delicious, not cloyingly sweet. It has a bit of refreshing cool notes like mint. It is totally different from Cloud and Baccarat Rouge, not a dupe at all. It smells just so beautiful and lasting but not too loud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2350487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2350487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349415" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Misanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1405210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Misanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405210">Misanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My signature scent. I layer it with strawberry oils and a vanilla moisturizer, creating an irresistible blend. People cant help but inhale deeply as I walk by. For some reason, this scent reminds me of the nostalgic aroma of lipstick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2349415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2349415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349402" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OliviaGigi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OliviaGigi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2323437">OliviaGigi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 21:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I initially got the sample of the Eau de toilette version. Loved it. Again, did the mistake of reading reviews about this version. I was convinced that it was made for me since I was on the hunt for a genuine fruity perfume. I only have one word to describe this perfume: overwhelming. The fruits scents smell like anything but natural to me. At least the longevity is pretty medium so the painful experience disappear after a few hours. Back to the eau de toilette!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2349402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2349402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For some reason the scent rsmimds me of lipstick</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2349373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2349373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2346708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nonrom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228105.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nonrom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228105">nonrom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is love at first sniff for me  perhaps all of Francis Kurkdjians perfumes perform well on me? Perhaps I should try them all!<br />
<br />
This definitely opens with a synthetic strawberry/raspberry  bubblegum, but not at all childish. Im totally enamoured by the smell. It somehow manages to smell sophisticated. Very airy, very gorgeous.<br />
<br />
It has some BR 540 DNA. It dries down to something a bit more subtle.<br />
<br />
I can see this being appropriate to wear to most places  if I want it to be lighter at the gym, I would probably wear Sdj dragon fruit, this smells very similar to that. To be more boss like, I would layer with BR 540.<br />
<br />
To me, this is fun, feminine,  Lighthearted. Just so beautiful.<br />
<br />
The one downside is that I now recognise that I mustve smelt it on a few people. Oh well, what can you do? <br />
<br />
I have heard a lot of comparisons to cloud pink, but to me this is very different. Cloud pink is more lactonic on me, less fruity, less airy, more warm, more coconuty, More like the OG cloud. I greatly prefer this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2346708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2346708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345395" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345395" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScaryNumbers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459285"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1459285.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScaryNumbers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Magnolia-83621.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83621.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"title="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345395ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345395" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459285">ScaryNumbers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>strawberry daiquiris + strawberry shortcake doll heads from the 90s + the strawberry shortcake eau de toilette with the top that's shaped like a strawberry from the early 2000s (ifykyk)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2345395"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2345395#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344079" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="witcheslikessmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="witcheslikessmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847940">witcheslikessmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been trying to work this perfume out for a while. I tried it in the summer but it was too sweet and loud to use it. In the first sprey you get hit by sour notes like cherry and lemon. It fades away to very sweet red berry smell. Burberry her has the Francis Kurkdjian dna and gives the Bcr vibe. I am not saying they smell similar but they have the same energy and vibe, which is LOUD. I dont think burberry her is girly like everyone says. It is sexy instead. I love the drydown more than opening, oakmoss and amber comes to surface. I do not think this perfume can be all year round. It is only good for spring imo. Smells a bit generic, synthetic strawberry. Good to have in your collection, but if you dont you are not missing anything</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2344079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2344079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venus as a girl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2310540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2310540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venus as a girl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2310540">venus as a girl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 12:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>burberry her smelled exactly like freshly washed sweet strawberries on the tester i couldnt get enough of it, but on my skin it turns more floral. it does smell a bit sour which i dont usually enjoy but its quite pleasant, it just adds to the strawberry of it all, i dont understand the people that say it smells like artificial strawberries maybe where im from our strawberries are of poor quality but it smells very realistic to me. Its not too sweet, yet still light and feminine, very easily lovable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2343362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2343362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MalibuMermaid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MalibuMermaid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701">MalibuMermaid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im just not girly enough for this. Fruit, flowers and powder galore. I find it an odd fragrance direction for the Burberry brand. It doesnt feel like the British countryside or streets of London or anything I associate with Burberry (a brand I really adore). More suited for a teenager.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2340912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2340912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sashazor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/191705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.191705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sashazor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-51488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/191705">sashazor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 19:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a cute and charming fragrance!<br />
<br />
The strawberry note is really strong and present throughout the entirety of its performance, its a sweet, almost synthetic strawberry candy note. Its very femenine and flirty, a little musky. I smell florals but no vanilla. <br />
<br />
I love this for warm, sunny weather. Its not striking or refined, but still really cute and fun! This is quite a young fragrance, so it might be appealing to teens or young women. Still, I see myself enjoying this regardless.<br />
<br />
Perfect for spring and summer. Its surprisingly long lasting, though rather intimate silage-wise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2340362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2340362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336534" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SimplyMichi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2294114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SimplyMichi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294114">SimplyMichi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm very unsure about this perfume. At first I hated it, on initial spray it gave me cough medicine vibes, but as it dried down it got sweeter and less intense. I can definitely smell all the blends of fruit and berry, and they do come together pretty well! At first it really does smell like real fruits, but because there's no real sweetness to it, it quickly enters cough medicine territory as it dries down, which is mega disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158240">roseekilljoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this and I can say that I enjoyed it the first time I wore it, it's fruity but musky! It's very feminine! But I do find this quite synthetic tbh, I finished my sample today, I gave it a good go and it's getting to me how sweet it is! Its giving cheap perfume for me sadly! <br />
Also what's getting to me is that I've been smelling this everywhere, that made me kind of hate this lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2335941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2335941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333938" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sheon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2306014.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sheon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); day, night, all year around, any occasion. very sweet, kinda fruity and a little floral? it doesnt have that bad general perfumey smell. lasts FOREVER, i can literally smell it on all my jackets weeks after using it. its prominent but not overpowering or sickly, im able to smell it randomly throughout the day. very feminine and cute, not sexy. smells almost exactly the same as the elixir. if you know for sure that you like sweet scents, its a safe buy. 1000% recommend atleast trying!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720852">misxag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The strawberry note is really dominant in this fragrance!! I picture it being perfect for every day without any special occasion. It feels really feminine imo, but it depends on your taste ofc. Overall, I wish I had that one, so I could talk more about it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2333469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2333469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332945" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="happybyscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="happybyscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441512">happybyscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 17:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so excited about this but it's just not it for me. First, it genuinely does not last no matter how much or where I spray it. That alone was a big turn off with the price point. Second, it smelled really sharp and medicinal--- which contrasts with it's "sister scents" like baccarat and cloud which are much softer. The synthetic strawberry was pungent for the hour it lasted on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2332945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2332945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331343" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Valanra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2303230"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Valanra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2303230">Valanra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you prep your skin properly this stuff can last all day. I don't know if its because I wear a hoodie or if it's because I also use the Burberry lotion so that's what I'm smelling but I'll put this perfume on in the morning and still smell it by bedtime. It'll cling to my clothing for days too. Again, I'm not sure if its because of the lotion I put on first getting on my clothes, but I don't always wear perfume every day and when I go to sneeze in my elbow I'll smell it on my hoodie still. I spray some on my wrists and it'll still hang around after at least one hand washing, sometimes two.<br />
It's expensive (for me anyway) but I really like it. It's a very feminine sweet scent, and definitely NOT gender neutral.<br />
The scent is sweet. I'm not really sure how else to describe it. Kind of vanilla, a little fruity (Berry fruity not like tropical fruity), and sugary with a very subtle warm powdery scent (vs like baby powder). Everyone keeps mentioning strawberries but I own strawberry perfume and it doesn't really smell like that to me. <br />
It's definitely NOT floral or super powdery on me because I HATE floral and powdery scents. Literally every perfume I own is Gourmand. Floral scents give me headaches and turn my stomach and powdery scents smell like old ladies and gives me headaches.<br />
I'd say it's more of a summer/spring daytime scent. It's youthful and ever so slightly "sexy" from the warm powdery smell (like if you could turn vanilla into a powder). <br />
Not really appropriate for a child (although because of how sweet it is overall I think children would like smelling it on an adult. like as a mother if you were to put this on and then hug your child later I think they would like the smell) but fine for an older teen/young adult and fine for an adult. It doesn't really have mature vibes to me, so I'd be surprised to find an older adult or elderly person wearing this (I'd guess the age range I'd expect to wear this to be about 17 to late 40s)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2331343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2331343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells identical to Baccarat Rouge IMO. Very long lasting and it suits every season.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2326784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2326784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322021" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuneGEMini0603"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2090195.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuneGEMini0603" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322021ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322021" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090195">JuneGEMini0603</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this one. It opens very sweet with a strawberry scent that reminds me of my favorite lip gloss. On my skin, it drys down to a sweet strawberry powder scent that is only slight musky. I never really detect a woody scent; I wish i did, and I would have liked more musk, but I still like this perfume for what it is. Im sure I can experiment with layering it with other scents to add a little of what I feel is missing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2322021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2322021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319248" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dreaming-in-moss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1810678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dreaming-in-moss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Good-Girl-39681.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39681.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Good Girl"title="Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810678">dreaming-in-moss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells okay on paper, not really my thing but it smells okay.<br />
However, when I did a skin test it did not mix well with my skin chemistry at all. I can only describe the smell as being like the way a veterinary clinic smells, but with an added rancid pungentness as well as a vague hint of artificial strawberry. I've never had a perfume smell like this bad on me before, and hopefully it never happens again.<br />
I've also heard that this perfume is a dupe of BR 540, so maybe I should stay far away from that one as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2319248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2319248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Burberry Her feels like a very artificial caramel, too simple, not refined.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2318424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2318424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317709" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miffie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2286221.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miffie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286221">miffie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>so so genuinely pretty and feminine. layers well with 'you' (glossier) because of the iris tones, surprisingly, &amp; has discernable sweetness but is not overpowering like many vanilla fragrances tend to be. reminds me a bit of 'bright crystal' (versace) but i do like this much better because of the subtle notes &amp; layerability.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2317709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2317709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317286" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Romyscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2259355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Romyscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Pure-Musc-For-Her-53441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Musc For Her"title="Pure Musc For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259355">Romyscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 03:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright, fun, lively, sparkling, and cheerful. Something about this perfume is very uplifting. It's the mix of bright fruits and musk and that slight touch of green. Some may describe it as childish, but I disagree! There's a difference between childish and youthful, and Burberry Her embodies the brightness and nostalgia of youth, but anyone can wear it really.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2317286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2317286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315833" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cymbra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248073"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2248073.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cymbra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248073">Cymbra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 16:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No joke, this makes me feel like a shoujo protagonist. Light, fluffy, and a little fruity. Exactly what you're looking for when you want to smell like the color pink. Very feminine and elegant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2315833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2315833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sniffmybreeze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731901"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1731901.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sniffmybreeze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);
