align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2315164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2315164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312446" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marshmallowbunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1398132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marshmallowbunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-Pour-Femme-15335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme"title="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398132">marshmallowbunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like those strawberry cigarettes you get out of the vending machine in Japan, combined with an array of bitter, syrupy fruits. Im sure its the patchouli and oak moss   The scent of a girl who had a cigarette and then doused herself in the fruitiest body spray to mask the odor. When I first sprayed this on, within minutes I wanted to scrub, but I gave it time to see if it would improve during the middle or base notes. It did not. Instead, it literally starts to smell like a MENS COLOGNE as the top notes die down. For those with ambroxan sensitivities, This is an AMBROXAN BOMB. It reminds me of Valentinos Donna Born in Roma, another scent I dislike, and is similar in profile to the scents in Ariana Grandes fragrance line, which isnt my taste. If you enjoy those super sweet and fruity perfumes. I truly cant understand why its compared to Strawberry Shortcake dolls and strawberry milkshakes. Like what???</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2312446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2312446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310701" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="f4iry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1352750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="f4iry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352750">f4iry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 21:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If baccarat rogue was girly and super flirty</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2310701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2310701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310173" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mikashake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192599"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192599.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mikashake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-Doux-97605.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97605.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You Doux"title="You Doux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192599">mikashake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was scared to test this for a long time because I was worried that I wouldn't like it...  I assumed that it would be overwhelmingly fruity or syrupy sweet, but I (thankfully) didnt find it to be that way at all! The muskier base notes balance out the sweetness of the fruits very well and you dont get too much of anything. Its like a soft, fluffy strawberry milk </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2310173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2310173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308889" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Natalie143"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2276944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Natalie143" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Shock-For-Her-12519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Shock For Her"title="CK One Shock For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276944">Natalie143</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a blast of raspberry. This is a nice full raspberry/mixed berry scent with juiciness and zing together with the sweetness. I find it very pleasant and fun. It mellows out and gets a bit less zingy and more soft sweet over time. Underneath the raspberry is a lovely complicated base mix. In the first couple hours I get hints of this complicated base then I start smelling it directly. I get musky amber with a hint of patchouli. There is something addictive about the mix of sweet raspberry and swirling complicated base notes.<br />
<br />
I get good longevity with very few sprays for this. Sometimes I'll wear this in the morning then go to the gym in the evening. When I start sweating I smell raspberries, it makes me feel super girly. I do find it wafts off and leaves scent around a bit, I personally prefer more intimate fragrances. But the scent is pretty "normal" so I think it is still office appropriate if you don't over-spray.<br />
<br />
This fragrance inspired me to try out Baccarat Rouge 540. I didn't like BR540 at all, really not my thing. Something in the feel of Burberry Her matches something in BR540 so I can't say they have nothing in common but the similarities are very limited.<br />
<br />
I always thought I hated patchouli so I was surprised that I liked the patchouli in this one. I gave a few more fragrances a try like Good Girl and Angel. Yup, turns out if I can distinctly smell patchouli in the opening then it is way too much for me. I don't hate them on other people but they really don't work for me personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2308889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2308889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304966" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moshpitbunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884658"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1884658.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moshpitbunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Eau-Papier-78658.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78658.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau Papier"title="L'Eau Papier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884658">Moshpitbunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Save your money and get the under $20 dupe Berry Juice from Minisoo. Smells exactly the same for a fraction of the price. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2304966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2304966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304481" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vertjardin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2275744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vertjardin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); Something Id give to a friend I didnt know well because it cant possibly offend. I get synthetic strawberry, the laughing gas kind dentists use at the office. The more musky dry down notes are the saving grace here and add maturity to the scent. Good Girls younger sister.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2304481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2304481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302917" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mmmPizza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mmmPizza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); So lovely and easy ti wear. long lasting and such a complex scent. Great for everyday or a special occasion. very versatile and one of my favorites.<br />
lots of sweet, creamy fruity notes. smells young and lively but not immature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2302917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2302917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302564" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elevatemuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="elevatemuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302564ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302564" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262066">elevatemuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 11:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A sweet, cute scent. It smells like cozy pink blankets, definitely a cozy type of gourmand, with bursts of marshmallows and berries. Berry pancakes. Strawberry cupcakes.<br />
<br />
Not overwhelming, the florals balance it out. But not a grandma type floral, more like a curated pink bouquet from a loved one.<br />
<br />
After several hours, the addictive sweetness remains, but with trails of soft muskiness and something else I can't pinpoint. Just that I want it to remain on my skin and clothing for as long as possible.<br />
<br />
A comforting scent, my first big girl perfume at the age of 15. However, no longer something I would reach for as it doesn't have the depth and complexity I'm looking for, but a lovely sweet comfort nonetheless.<br />
<br />
Most suitable winter leaning into spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2302564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2302564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647461">ElizabethIII</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 20:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance, at first, smells like a strawberry covered in good white chocolate (not that fake white chocolate) then it dries down to something earthy yet feminine.  Very different from most of the fragrances I am generally drawn to.  Its playful yet sophisticated.  And a good 12 months out of the year it would smell lovely, a plus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2301876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2301876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very synthetic and dusty smelling. Cloying. Really glad I only got a travel size to try. NOT a safe blind buy. Try it on your skin first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2300748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2300748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296794" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liv_Grace!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266230"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liv_Grace!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266230">Liv_Grace!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 07:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not as pleasant as everyone makes this fragrance out to be. The strawberry has a synthetic candy note that is headache inducing and the dry down has a dank and dusty quality to it that I can only assume comes from the patchouli and oakmoss.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2296794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2296794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cherrybeth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cherrybeth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859967">cherrybeth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 03:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a scent for whoever thinks Cloud by Ariana Grande is not sweet enough, but Cloud Pink is way too childishly sweet. It's right in the middle of both, I haven't tried them side by side, but that is what came to mind (as someone who wanted to like the Cloud scents). If Cloud is in her early twenties, then Burberry Her is her fun but responsible older sister, who already has a job. I tried this on in the store and could still smell this on my wrist at night. It still smelled nicely sweet and it's not as much of a skin scent as other perfumes I've tried.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2296632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2296632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997552">Ha1100-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 11:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hate to say this but I personally think this is one of the worst perfumes Ive ever smelled. For the price the scent is extremely synthetic and smells like a really cheap fragrance, it almost smells like a scented bug spray. Very sweet and cloying can be actually nauseating. This seems to have a really big cult following which means a lot of people like it so dont take my word for it definitely smell yourself but this is not a safe blind buy and I really would not recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumeistherapy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumeistherapy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); It makes you feel girly, young and fun. I love the opening, fruity and sweet and then I get more musk, little vanilla, alltought I still feel some fruitiness in background. I tried it in store and after an year decided to get it, because was still one that I was thinking about. I love to wear it when I go out in the city. I did not tried it yet in winter but in dry summer does very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2289550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2289550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soso0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253047"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soso0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253047">Soso0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, at first i only smelled cat piss out of it because of the black currant, but after weeks I started to smell vanilla and a bit of strawberry and on my skin i smell the strawberry chantilly tart. I'll update in a few months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2288635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2288635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If u like fruity and sweet This is it! Look no further!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2265086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2265086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265085" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="roseekilljoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2158240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="roseekilljoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Jasmine-75190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"title="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265085ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265085" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158240">roseekilljoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am trying a sample right now, and I like it way more that i did on the test strip! So this one is def something you need to try on skin!<br />
For me it was quite fruity in the begining but with a mix of musk! Its a very lovely and sweet musky scent, but it evolves into more jazmine/musk/cashemere mid point which i also like a lot!<br />
I sprayed a very subtle amount (one on each arm and behind the ears), and after a couple hours im still getting that loveley silliage around me and i can smell the sweetnes to it! which gives me good perfomance vibes! if i had the full size id be careful to overspray bc i think it can be too musky and sweet, but thats just my preference!<br />
<br />
i think this lasted a good 4hrs maybe on me?? but remember i sprayed very little so i think its a moderate duration to a lasting scent! <br />
over all i think its very pretty, very pinkysh, very femenine, sweet, i could see myself getting a 30ml bottle just to have it around sometimes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Then this note softens, and the perfume becomes subtly sweet. It's a composition with a slight edge, fitting the image of a London girl.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2263422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2263422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rose_nymph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706783.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rose_nymph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Sex"title="Vanilla Sex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783">rose_nymph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I somehow forgot about this beauty after getting its counterpart, the Her Elixir. Burberry Her to me is like when you are making strawberry compote. It smells like fresh strawberries that have been melting with some granulated sugar. But it is not a 'sugary' smell. It is more so an accentuation of the rich sweetness of the strawberry itself.<br />
Burberry Her (this one) smells fresh, juicy, beautiful, and more grown up, a woman in her mid 20s.<br />
The Burberry Her Elixir, the counterpart, smells more so like a creamy strawberry milkshake, very cute and shy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2253443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2253443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252306" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kikibonini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1906770.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kikibonini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); Burberry Her is a straightforward, pleasant crowd pleaser. It really shines in spring but works for summer too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2252306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2252306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It has the same emotional impact as those little-girl strawberry perfumes my friends had in the 80s and 90s, in a grown-up way. Just a very nice, comforting, lovely scent. I wish it lasted slightly longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2234588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2234588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love that we can smell the note of violet so thats way it has risen in my ranking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2233597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2233597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yes2heaven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1708924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yes2heaven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goest/Dauphine-55664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dauphine"title="Dauphine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708924">yes2heaven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 21:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's fine. I blind-bought this a while back while I was scrolling the Sephora website in a particularly sick and twisted mood and wanted to smell like strawberries and feel like a more gentle woman than I am. I don't think it smells like strawberries at all, btw. It's generically sweet and floral... reminds me of when I was a kid and would go to the public library to snatch up the magazines while their perfume sample cards were still intact. Anyway I would totally wear this on a date with a dumb man or to a job that I don't really like.<br />
<br />
Also the bottle is deceptively delicate and feminine looking but it's ACTUALLY really sturdy. It reminds me of one of those big vapes that has a touchscreen or a computer hard drive or something. I have thrown it in my disgusting mangled rucksack many a time with few issues (honestly I think it's dented the edges of my laptop, it's that dense)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2232303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2232303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Bought a sampler from shoppers several years ago and this was the one that I bought a fullsize of. I just love the effervescent feel of this. This fragrance makes me feel pretty and lighthearted.  Today I found a very close dupe for it at Winners. It's called Amber and Jasmine by Sand + Fog.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2232209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2232209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225800" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Abeer Alatrash"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2134624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Abeer Alatrash" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624">Abeer Alatrash</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 02:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best fruity Perfumes I had smelled ever, fruity fragrance in top notes moves to be more depth by the time, balanced ingrediants in dry down without Overwhelms one of other. The dry down mixed very well with "Strawberry, Raspberry, Blackberry, Sour Cherry and Black Currant" of top notes still exist in the background, I adore to wear it in summer season rather winter and any time during the day or at night. It lasts 12 hours or more on the leather and one day on the clothes, In General, Summer pefrumes didn't last along time which is excellent choice.<br />
<br />
I was testing another versions of "Burberry Her", I advise to purchase "Burberry Her Elixir" if you want the same fragrance with more vanilla, the same fragrance with more intense and depneth. if you want to reinforce the fruity side of this perfume I advise to make layering with "Love whisper Mist from Golden Rose brand" the mentioned mist have similar scent with another fruits.<br />
<br />
I adore this feeling of feminine, Classy, liveliness spirit of this perfume.<br />
<br />
<br />
                                .         "       "                           .  12                         .<br />
<br />
      " "   "  "                  .               "Love Whisper"   " "            .<br />
<br />
         .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2225800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2225800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224560" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hellokittybutt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194810"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194810.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hellokittybutt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194810">Hellokittybutt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think the raspberry notes really stand out in this fragrance with a hint of vanilla. This is my favorite scent at the moment. It reminds me of Juliette has a gun mmm which I love but gave to my mom who also loves it. I think its wearable in all weather and if sprayed lightly wearable to work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2224560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2224560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224248" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumelovere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumelovere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196236">perfumelovere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this smells like My Little Pony meets strawberry shortcake dolls. That vinyl smell is really prominent although I have no clue from the notes how that is produced from those ingredients. I suspect that is why this one is compared to Cloud which is often described as plasticky. Oddly, I don't pick up on it at all from Cloud but I certainly do here. I also smell the sweaty sweet metallic overtone of BR540 that is associated with dental offices. I tried to love Burberry Her because I thought it would be a juicy fresh strawberry perfume but it is a synthetic bomb no matter who is wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2224248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2224248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223649" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saladkayak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138529"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2138529.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saladkayak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her"title="Burberry Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223649ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223649" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138529">Saladkayak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cant sing enough praise to do justice to Burberry Her. To my nose, its raspberry dominant, which I love. It is deliciously sweet, unabashedly girly, and very versatile; I wear this to work and feel confident, but Id also wear this to tour a vineyard. It is definitely more of a day scent, while Burberry Her Elixir feels more like a night scent. In addition to being so lovely of a scent that it is my go-to, it also lasts around eight hours. I do two sprays on my neck and a spray on each wrist. Id imagine it would stay even longer if I didnt shower or workout after work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2223649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2223649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Do you know those syenthetic candies or syrups that we used to drink when we were little? It smells like that in a bottle. One thing that i also noticed is that theres this honey to my nose. Honestly its a nice fragrance to have. If you think this is a fresh strawberries, sorry to break your bubbles, its not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2222121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2222121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217888" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="judearose123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1770042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="judearose123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217888ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217888" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1770042">judearose123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 18:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my very first big girl perfume. I was at Ulta with my boyfriend a couple weeks before Christmas and I smelled this one and liked it, then unwrapped a 50 ml bottle from him on Christmas Day. My Victoria Secret perfumes were forgotten after that Christmas. I now have 20+ bottles in my collection and I still reach for this one every once in awhile, for the scent memories. Its very bright and fruity in the opening, slightly synthetic but in a perfumey way. A lot of people compare it to plastic babydoll strawberry scent, and I can understand the comparison, but I personally love it and Ill continue to reach for it this summer. I randomly decided to wear it to run errands after not wearing it for months and I was impressed by my beautiful scent bubble, the performance definitely improves over time. Overall, if youre a girly girl and you like to wear crowd pleasing scents and get plenty of compliments, I recommend this one. You can always rely on Francis Kurkdjion for a perfect musky fruity perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2217888"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2217888#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
