El aroma es dulce pero el secado me marea mucho el olor a musgo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2158784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2158784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156878" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MelissaGT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MelissaGT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022450">MelissaGT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Artificially flavored strawberry smarties. Fluffy...poofy...clouds of fake strawberry. I love strawberry scents. But this one is too processed smelling for me. If you're looking for a grown up juicy strawberry look no further than Coach Love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2156878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2156878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156458" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2088951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); I have a similar experience with better performance from Anna Sui's Violet Vibes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2156458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2156458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuddenlySpring"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1746842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1746842.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuddenlySpring" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Coconut-Sun-81412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coconut Sun"title="Coconut Sun"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1746842">SuddenlySpring</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 13:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just now am smelling this for the first time methinks. I thought I'd smelled it in a Sephora, but don't remember it smelling like anything that day. I've been wearing this sample since last night &amp; sprayed it again after a shower. It lasted on my clothes from last night and has lasted on my skin for at least 5 hours now. I'm super impressed. This feels like one of those moments where one says, "Where have you been all my life?" It's really gorgeous. <br />
If you don't smell anything, try it again at a later time when you haven't been smelling forty fragrances right before smelling this one. It's really light but lasts a long time on me! Beautiful strawberries :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2153785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2153785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078091">ghostchai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unfortunately, I found Her EDP to be really unpleasant. After seeing the raving reviews, I was so excited for my decant to come...only for my hopes to be slashed with the overwhelming scent of black licorice/anise. It also reminded me of something sour being burned, like melting plastic or stomach acid. <br />
<br />
I know it must smell beautiful on some people, but not on me lol. My husband even came home, smelled my arm, and said "Oh. That doesn't smell right." I tried the scent again in Sephora and had the same experience. I ended up loving the EDT though (new fave), so I'd give that one a try if this one didn't do it for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2151988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2151988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Pretty and pink and simple. Its gentle and although synthetic its not harsh. The base notes give it a comforting quality. I enjoy it and would really like it on the right person but its not for me - on me it feels a little juvenile, forgettable, lacking dimension.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2150555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2150555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Janney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/180502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.180502.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Janney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her"title="Burberry Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/180502">Janney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 02:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this one, by mistake, instead of Her Elixir, and I like it! <br />
Her scent is beautiful  clean, fruity, put-together and delicious. Theres a waft of strawberry and raspberry at the opening, and it reminds me of those fruit-smelling lipglosses!<br />
I legit got it a few days ago, and already had a few people ask me what I was wearing, since they liked it so much!<br />
Pair it Aquolinas Pink Sugar (PS) body mist, and youll end up smelling like a strawberry shortcake! <br />
<br />
The ONLY downsides to this fragrance are the longevity and sillage. Even though the scent profile is very pretty, I CANNOT, for the life of me, detect this for longer than the 30-minute mark nor does it last on my skin! Id need to reapply this after a short amount of time.<br />
Perhaps Ive gotten nose-blind, but people around me still feel it. <br />
<br />
Would I repurchase this?<br />
Because of the poor longevity and sillage, will I have to sadly say no.<br />
Might opt into finally getting Her Elixir next time, if it wont be discontinued by the time Id make my next purchase.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2149192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2149192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147417" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144766" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alliengoddess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alliengoddess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Flower-Ikebana-Sakura-82544.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82544.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower Ikebana Sakura"title="Flower Ikebana Sakura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896379">alliengoddess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful powdery (creamy?) strawberry but clean perfume, if that makes any sense haha. The drydown is SOOOOO PRETTY!!  I think it's very similar to BBW Gingham Gorgeous (which I also love), but obviously, the longevity is insanely different. On me, it lasts a lot, over 6 hours, and it smells soooooo good. I feel like a baby, kinda nostalgic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2144766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2144766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143609" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="praeyz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116572"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2116572.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="praeyz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116572">praeyz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is beautiful, sadly doesnt last long on my skin. I pair it with BBW Among The Clouds, the note of vanilla blends pretty nice with it. Dont think its worth the price though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2143609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2143609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="poodleParty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701047"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1701047.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="poodleParty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701047">poodleParty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wearing this for about a month now, so I think I can write a fair review ...Once the opening notes settle on my skin, it's basically an amber scent with a hint of strawberries. It's very popular, but it's not "basic" at all...in fact, I think this combination of red berries &amp; amber &amp; musk is kinda bizarre. <br />
<br />
I like it enough to wear it, but I'm not sure if I'd purchase it again. I don't really think it's a crowd pleaser, no.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2142140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2142140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />

Sweet, fluffy musk, literally a pink cloud fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2141931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2141931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I tend to like sweet and fruity fragrances, but this is so synthetic smelling. The only thing comparable to it is strawberry medicine. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139276" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SinSemilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1728607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1728607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SinSemilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1728607">SinSemilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw a video in which a guy jokingly describes women based on the perfume they choose to wear. For this one, he said the woman who wears this is one liked by everyone, she's just so nice all the time.<br />
<br />
A few days later, my best friend, who is a sweet angel, said she smelled this in store and completely fell in love with it (I never told her about the video). <br />
<br />
I obviously had to go out and test it for myself... lo' and behold, YES, this is the perfume a perfect, pure, angelic, cinnamon roll type of girl would wear!!!<br />
<br />
It smells like fluffy dessert with berries on it, or like scented lotion labeled "body yogurt". Very appetizing and sweet but not in an overly gourmand way. <br />
<br />
I would wear this too but I am too evil for it unfortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2139276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2139276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137012" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daisypolo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1701781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="daisypolo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701781">daisypolo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strawberry yogurt / strawberry chewits / strawberries and cream. Very much a synthetic strawberry scent, but not in a harsh way. Very soft, almost like marshmallows, and warm. Fairly generic, but on the gentler side. Has pretty good sillage - at least 2 hours. Would make a great gift for a tween / teenage girl if she's into all things pretty and pink.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2137012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2137012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135670" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jdluvz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jdluvz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Hawas-for-Him-46890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hawas for Him"title="Hawas for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135670ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135670" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024728">jdluvz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 02:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry Her EDP to my nose smells like a delicious crunchy candied strawberry fruit snack, a milkshake, icecream, and cake. Sweet but not too sweet.<br />
<br />
Main accords are on point as I get the fruity, sweet, vanillary, powdery, musky, and a hint of woody notes. Fresh and smooth scent that doesn't irritate my nose and throat. No headache too. <br />
<br />
Projection and longevity are moderate. Six sprays on my shirt lasts for 4 hours. The longevity really depends on my environment as I'd be smelling like food when in the kitchen or restaurant, so definitely reapplication is needed. Even sprayed before bed, 8 hours later the scent is still on my clothes. A bit faint but woke up still smelling good. <br />
<br />
I love Burberry Her EDP. And when I want a more fruity floral scent, I layer with Burberry Her Blossom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2135670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2135670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930042">evepucci</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect for summer and spring. Light and feminine. Smells like strawberries and cream.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2133763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2133763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Richa30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2033662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Richa30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2033662">Richa30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrances are relative, glad I didnt blind buy this. To me it smells like strawberry flavored cough syrup or strawberry milk that has gone sour. Hard pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2129452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2129452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670000">ARainyDayInMay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely strawberry note in the beginning! <br />
<br />
I might be tired of all the BR540 clones/dupes/inspirations, but I wouldn't repurchase it after it's finished. <br />
<br />
Lasting power is pretty crazy, and it does the same as BR540, appearing and disappearing at will.<br />
<br />
It's crowd pleasing, not particularly sweet, highly synthetic, but good for warm weather. Doubt it actually has lasting power in the winter though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2123932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2123932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You can really smell the strawberry and its so cute! There is a sourness to it and even though I love it I kind of wish it was a little bit sweeter. But I am so excited to wear this on a warm summer day! I dont think this is similar to Cloud but its still amazing!<br />
EDIT:<br />
I really like to pair this with Oriana, it makes me feel super girly!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2119945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2119945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; An everyday scent that I love! One of my favorites among the Burberry line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2114734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2114734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113173" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cathy20145"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cathy20145" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Viva-la-Juicy-4410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viva la Juicy"title="Viva la Juicy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082442">cathy20145</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, the opening smells like strawberry candy (not the artificial type). I quite like it and that convinced me to buy the full bottle. Then in the middle it mingles with the violet and jasmine, its subtle and pleasant. The dry down: I wish the vanilla was more prominent on my skin, but the musk and patchouli stands out way more. I dont really like the dry down. Ill keep using this perfume just for the strawberry opening. Ive heard other people say Burberry Her Elixir is more creamy and theres more vanilla, so thats definitely on my wish list!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2113173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2113173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The journey to the dry down was not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2113011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2113011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112759" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marialena888m"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1135263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1135263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marialena888m" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Splendida-Magnolia-Sensuel-47820.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47820.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Splendida Magnolia Sensuel"title="Splendida Magnolia Sensuel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1135263">marialena888m</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a real beauty in cool air. I love to wear it on slightly chilly spring mornings. It smells like hope and innocent beginnings. I wish it had caramel and rose in it, then it would be like a modernized Miss Dior Cherie 2005, a strawberry masterpiece that I still pine for to this day. Caution: when temperatures start to warm, it begins to lose its magic and smells just like strawberry car-freshener (yes, those christmas tree shaped onesespecially if oversprayed). Its actually long lasting, but there are days when I get anosmic to the drydown and can barely smell it after 2-3 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2112759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2112759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kqxede"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2078675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kqxede" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-Intense-83988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe Intense"title="Prada Paradoxe Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078675">Kqxede</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a good everyday fragrance.its sweet,innocent and fruity but to me it kinda smells like milk?im not sure maybe i got tired of it. But the fragrance itself is okay</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2110746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2110746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Murphs_law"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Murphs_law" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061804">Murphs_law</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 09:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE the dry down of Burberry Her. I can smell it on my hoodie for days and it has pretty good sillage for the first hour or two. My only problem is that it smells like plastic fruit while the sillage is good. After that first part wears off, its great! I get red fruit, violet, some musk and a light vanilla. Thankfully, for me, the best parts last the longest. I probably wont spend the money for a full bottle, but Ill happily wear what I have now until its gone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2108808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2108808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108292" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="forumgames"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1897248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="forumgames" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897248">forumgames</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-29">03/29/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I prefer the OG to the Elixir, in the opening it's very fruity, almost juicy and sweet. I love the violet here and I think that is a necessary note in Burberry Her,  it perfectly sustains and blends in with the other notes. Definitely a +1<br />
The sillage and lasting power of the OG are weaker than the Elixir, with medium-weak sillage.<br />
The drydown leans towards the "candy sweet' type of sweetness.<br />
It reminds me of red fruits candies.<br />
<br />
At first I preferred the Elixir, but time made the OG much much better than the Elixir.<br />
The fragrance overall has gotten much much better by time, it blended more and for the better. Sillage and lasting power got better</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2108292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2108292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It was also hard to wash off so I guess at least it has longevity. Those super sweet berry scents aren't usually my thing anyways but I had grabbed the sample hoping the patchouli note would stand out more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The EDP is  sparkly, fun, fresh and fruity, a top 10 for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="2102042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=2102042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;             </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1032181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1032181" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blake.lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.996171.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blake.lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SP-Parfums-Sven-Pritzkoleit/Suntanglam-43301.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43301.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Suntanglam"title="Suntanglam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1032181ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1032181" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996171">blake.lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-16">02/16/19 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I havent been on here in a while, but had to make a special trip for this review. When Francis Kurkdjian put out Baccarat Rouge 540 I did a very short review stating it smelled of cotton candy and all things pink and girly and was it not a $300 niche fragrance everyone would be complaining about another sugar laden addition to the market. What Kurkdijan did was very smart though. He allowed people who felt they were too sophisticated for such offerings to love one. Its no surprise the fragrance is so popular it has lead to cheaper spinoffs including this one also by Kurkdijan. The other is Cloud by Ariana Grande. Burberry Her is sweeter and less woods but oh so similar. Cloud is lighter and muskier with obviously less quality ingredients but, again, its close. People are up in arms at the suggestion a fragrance they paid $300 for could possibly be replicated for a fragrance a 1/3 or a 1/4 the price but it is. I have to say Im amused because as I predicted people are complaining Her and Cloud are overly sweet, overly girly sugar scents but theyre at least 85% dupes for Baccarat Rouge 540.<br />
<br />
If I was forced to pick one, my pick of the three is this one. Her has a touch of a lipstick/cosmetic powder vibe I prefer. However, any of the three fits the bill of a cotton candy fragrance with a twist. The main difference?<br />
<br />
Baccarat Rouge 540 = $300 and a bit more cedar <br />
<br />
Burberry Her = $100 and a bit more lipstick vibe <br />
<br />
Cloud = $50 and bit more musky</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1032181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1032181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1005413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1005413" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daria_21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/994396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.994396.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daria_21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Tender-Romance-36147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tender Romance"title="Tender Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1005413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1005413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/994396">Daria_21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-30">11/30/18 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People just love to hate on new, sweet frags, don't they?<br />
<br />
I saw this in store and sprayed a bit on a paper tester.  Top notes were very berry, sweet, and borderline juvenile.  So, I put the tester in my coat pocket and forgot about it.  Days later, I kept smelling something utterly divine.  That smell was coming from the tester in my coat pocket!  Inhaling the card deeply, I made my way back to the store and sprayed it on my wrist.  After letting it sit for the day, I was completely hooked, and returned yet again to purchase a bottle. <br />
<br />
That dry down - ohhhh, that glorious dry down.  So smooth, sweet yet elegant, coupled with glorious juicy berries makes this scent utterly feminine, breezy and effervescent. <br />
<br />
Burberry Her is also incredibly long lasting.  That paper tester in my coat pocket is still sailing strong after over a week of being sprayed.  On my skin, it projects beautifully for several hours, and remains a skin scent for a true 24 hours.  On my first day out and about with Her on, I was complimented by a girl behind me in line, who commented that I smell wonderful, and what was it that I was wearing? <br />
<br />
Please ignore the hate on this. If you're curious about Her, I urge you to go out and try it for yourself.  Let it mingle and marry with your skin, and give it a chance to shine. <br />
<br />
Lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1005413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1005413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1466074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1466074" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LesGirls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1356069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LesGirls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicki-Minaj/Onika-25913.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25913.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Onika"title="Onika"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1466074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1466074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356069">LesGirls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-18">12/18/21 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like if I'd had the guts to fly into a feminist rage at age ten and burn my Barbies, then gleefully roast marshmallows over the flames.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1466074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1466074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1052317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1052317" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luxury Problem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1069324.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luxury Problem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-54785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani"title="Ani"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1052317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1052317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069324">Luxury Problem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-18">04/18/19 18:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strawberry Baccarat Rouge 540.  I get the strawberry milkshake vibe and then the same bandaid dry down as BR540 and Ariana Grande Cloud, which may be a skin chemistry thing.  I have to say, I accidentally spilled this on myself before going to the grocery store and got four compliments from random strangers, which never happens.  I also have to say that I am an 80s baby and this smell gives me nostalgia for my old strawberry shortcake doll.  I swear she smelled just like this.  <br />
<br />
I did really enjoy wearing it, both for the sweet creamy strawberry milkshake aroma and for the 80s nostalgia.  This perfume is sweet and catchy like a pop song.  It also has fantastic longevity and sillage, though the late dry down six hours on is dominant with that bandage note from BR540, at least on my skin.  I still want a bottle, though.  Overall, its a smell that just makes me feel happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1052317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1052317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1002608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1002608" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LIN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.23597.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LIN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-Superdose-56679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume Superdose"title="Not A Perfume Superdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1002608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1002608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23597">LIN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-20">11/20/18 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OMG I totally disagree with all the negative reviews around here for this new Burberry release!!<br />
<br />
This perfume is much much more then it seems to be at a first sniff or when you read the notes..<br />
the complexity of the fruit mixture here is just amazing and the fragrance gets a very radiant, fresh and sexy wave!!<br />
If I had to describe it in just one word, it would be: Radiance!!<br />
This perfume is just glowing! I have never thought I would fall in love so deep with a fruity perfume, but there is always a first time to everything I guess.. A new love is on my want list and it's nothing too expensive or high branded, just a simple mainstream.<br />
When I spray this one on me, it stays for hours or even days on my clothes and hair.. Amazing job Burberry!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1002608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1002608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="51694" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc992643" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="forkingpaths"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1151537"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="forkingpaths" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/A-Drop-d-Issey-66334.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66334.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Drop d'Issey"title="A Drop d'Issey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma992643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd992643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); Burberry Her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="992643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=992643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent988023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
