padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656487">ScarlettX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-04">10/04/18 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sense the strawberry, but not the fresh strawberry. It's like strawberry flavored candy smell, where there's no real strawberry, just the flavoring. <br />
The base appears just after an hour or so and it's getting woody and musky, there's also a moss note.<br />
My nose says, the base isn't that feminine, more masculine.<br />
But the strawberry candy note is still there, that's just weird.<br />
I think they're aiming at new kind of style with it and that doesn't suit me very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="988023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=988023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1034319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1034319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pattygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.51882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pattygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Epico/Vani-Noire-81894.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81894.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vani Noire"title="Vani Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1034319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1034319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51882">pattygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-22">02/22/19 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strawberry, strawberry, strawberry. Not the fresh sort. The shiny wrapper, hard strawberry candy with the jelly center that you take from the candy dish at the doctors office kind. It smells exactly like that to me. Synthetic, sweet, strawberry candy. There is a bit of freshness to this, but it is overcome by the strawberry. I do not detect any woody notes on my skin; a bit more would have made this more interesting to me. I dont hate it, but I dont like it, either. Almost like a waaaay watered down Hanae Mori. Ill pass on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1034319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1034319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1277270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1277270" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yuki21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yuki21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1277270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1277270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295820">Yuki21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-16">01/16/21 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this without giving it entire day trial, I loved the fruity/berry notes to it and took a gamble by buying a rollerball. I now regret it. After wearing it for 3 days, each day I wore it, I disliked it even more each time. I realized the first top notes was the only thing I liked, but then the dry down was just too irritating. I'm not sure what note to blame it on, but it has an odd, synthetic, artificial, almost like if a doll had a creamy plastic smell to it. The 3rd day I tried this perfume, I rushed home and took a shower to wash it off me. It's so irritating how I cannot identify what this note is, because I dislike it so much I feel like I need to avoid this note with all fragrances. Does anyone know what I'm talking about? Does anyone know what it is? What is the base note that's causing this odd dry down?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1277270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1277270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314960" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CreamSunshine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CreamSunshine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228805">CreamSunshine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-27">03/27/21 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont know what it is about my nose, but I never manage to smell what everyone else is raving about with these super hyped scents of the moment. All I smell from Burberry Her is: salt, metallic note, dentists office, medicinal smell. I get the same impression from the also mega-popular BR 540 and Ariana Grande Cloud. Im beginning to believe that some people cant smell these notes properly, the way some people cant eat cilantro because they only taste soap.<br />
<br />
Update: I wrote this review without having yet read anyone elses reviews (I just hear people rave about Burberry Her on YouTube a lot) and without knowing that anyone else had ever compared this to BR540 or Cloud. The impression was real and immediate to my nose, without anyone else having suggested it to me before. Further supporting my theory that some of us have weird noses that only pick up dentist office smell from these fragrances</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51694"comment_id="1314960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html?ccid=1314960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="51694" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="51694":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="51694" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

<script>
    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {

                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });

            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
